title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
3/3 Algebraic Solution:

1 point is earned for correctly setting xA = xB, or yA = yB

1 point is earned for correctly solving for t

1 point is earned for correctly showing other coordinates are equal

Set t−2= 3t 2 −4;t=4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiabg2da9maalaaapaqaa8qacaaIZaGa amiDaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaacqGHsislcaaI0aGaai4oaiaadshacq GH9aqpcaaI0aaaaa@41A5@

OR

3/3 Graphical Solution:

1 point is earned for correctly identifying t = 4

1 point is earned for correctly verifying xA = 2, yA = 4 and xB = 2, yB = 4 at t = 4

1 point is earned for eliminating other point

When t = 4 , the y-coordinates for A and B are also equal. Particles collide at (2,4) when t = 4 .
